businessProfile.name: Esposito's Pizza Bar Restaurant
businessProfile.address: 2221 S University Dr, Davie, FL 33324, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 2221 S University Dr, Davie, FL 33324, USA

reviews.text: I‚Äôll come here for lunch three days a week and it never disappoints ! The pizza is amazing. The pastas are amazing. The staff is absolutely fabulous . Love Juan and Kimberly! The owner always says hello and he   Is awesome! I have a co worker that had her birthday party here and they were so accommodating.

What a hidden gem! The food here is phenomenal! Took advantage of happy hour options to try a quite a bit of dishes the pizza is really good; chewy soft and crispy. The Pear Ravioli is a must order, slightly and sweet cheesy dish.

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Hands down one of the best Italian spots in Davie! Every time we come to Esposito‚Äôs, the food hits the spot. The pizza is always fresh, cheesy, and perfectly crispy on the edges and amazing drinks.

Big shoutout to Barbara, she was super friendly, attentive, and made the whole experience even better. It‚Äôs always nice when the service matches the quality of service . Highly recommend!

Dining at this establishment was a memorable experience! The decor was elegant yet comfortable, making it perfect for an intimate dinner or a celebratory gathering. I tried the chef‚Äôs signature dish, which was brilliantly presented and bursting with flavor. The service was impeccable ‚Äì my server was knowledgeable about the menu and made excellent wine pairings that complemented my meal perfectly. Although the prices were on the higher side, the quality and creativity of the food made it worth every penny. I can't wait to visit again!
Amazing food and service. We had apps for happy hour so there were 2 pcs but still so good and filling! The owner is really nice too. 10/10 recommend.

editorial_summary.overview: Counter-serve eatery for Italian fare, pizzas from a coal-fired oven & draft beer, to stay or go.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 5.0/5 rating across 5 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the pizza for being fresh, cheesy, and perfectly crispy on the edges, making it a standout dish. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The staff, including specific mentions of Juan, Kimberly, and Barbara, are highlighted for their friendliness and attentiveness, significantly enhancing the dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

The restaurant's elegant yet comfortable decor creates a memorable dining atmosphere, perfect for both intimate dinners and celebratory gatherings. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
